title: BDO Unibank 3Q Net Profit Rose 43%
text:
By Kosaku Narioka

BDO Unibank Inc. (BDO.PH) said its third-quarter net profit rose 43% from a year earlier, as revenue increased steadily.

The Philippines' largest bank by assets said Monday that net profit for the third quarter was 11.96 billion Philippine peso ($233.5 million), up from PHP8.37 billion a year ago. That beat analysts' estimate of PHP9.85 billion, according to FactSet.

For the first nine months of the year, net profit rose 49% to PHP32.11 billion, largely driven by the expansion in the bank's recurring core revenue streams, it said. Customer loans rose 6% from a year earlier to PHP2.1 trillion, while total deposits increased 3% to PHP2.4 trillion, the lender said.

BDO said its third-quarter revenue jumped 19% to PHP55.43 billion.
